discussions package¶

discussions.models¶

class discussions.models.DiscussionActivity(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: core.models.AbstractActivity

– DiscussionActivity is the class for Discussion.

Fields:
title – Title of activity.
instructions – Instructions about this activity.
lesson – A lesson this activity belongs to, it could be null.
display_order – Display order of activity.
created – Time of creation.
modified – Time of last modification.
is_active – Flag for activation of activity.
activity_type – Type of current activity.
posts – Associated comments/posts.
permission_control – Flag for permission control within an activity.
is_deleted – Flag for soft deletion of current activity.
collection – The course that this discussion activity belongs to.
read_after_post – Flag for whether or not the student has to post their own post in order to see others’ posts.
private_mode – Flag for whether or not students can only see their own interaction with instructors.
Meta:
abstract – Set class to abstract
permissions – Object level permission control(“view_activity” permission is checked when permission_control is set to true )

discussions.sockets¶

class discussions.sockets.ThreadNamespace(environ, ns_name, request=None)[source]¶

Bases: socketio.namespace.BaseNamespace, socketio.mixins.RoomsMixin, socketio.mixins.BroadcastMixin

The main class for a namespace

log(message)[source]¶

– This is a log function

Parameters:message – A message to be logged such as connect/disconnect/nickname.
Returns:Log the message.
on_join(roomType, roomNumber)[source]¶

– Join a chat room

Parameters:
  • roomType – Type of the activity such as ‘discussion’/‘overdub’.
  • roomNumber – ID of the activity.
on_nickname(nickname)[source]¶

– Validate a user and broadcast this event

Parameters:nickname – username of potential user.
recv_disconnect()[source]¶

– Disconnect current user.

on_user_message(msg)[source]¶

– Save and boradcast a user’s message

Parameters:msg – user’s message.
on_user_comment(msg)[source]¶

– Save and boradcast a user’s comment to others’ messages

Parameters:msg – user’s comment.
postSave(msg, parent_post=None, audio_URL=None, attachments=None, attachmentsName=None)[source]¶

– Save a message as POST

Parameters:
  • msg – The text of a message.
  • parent_post – The parent post if it is a comment.
  • audio_URL – URL to the audio file.
  • attachments – URLs to attachments.
  • attachmentsName – Names of attachments.
emit_to_room_include_me(room, event, *args)[source]¶

– Send this event to all users in the room (in this particular Namespace)

Parameters:
  • room – The room to boradcast.
  • event – The name of the event such as “eventX”.(“event X” should be listened on the client side and will be triggered if “event X” is boradcasted).
